Label.en: The Louvre castle was heavily renovated, and the famous wings were added!
Label.fr: Le château du Louvre fut entièrement rénové et les fameuses ailes ajoutées de chaque côté !
Label.es: The Louvre castle was heavily renovated, and the famous wings were added!
Label.zh: The Louvre castle was heavily renovated, and the famous wings were added!

Label.en: It was a palace truly worthy of the wealth of renaissance France!
Label.fr: C'était un palais digne de la riche renaissance Française !
Label.es: It was a palace truly worthy of the wealth of renaissance France!
Label.zh: It was a palace truly worthy of the wealth of renaissance France!

Label.en: Well, showing off was a huge part of being a king in those times!
Label.fr: De fait, à cette époque, frimer faisait partie intégrante du boulot de roi !
Label.es: Well, showing off was a huge part of being a king in those times!
Label.zh: Well, showing off was a huge part of being a king in those times!

Label.en: Looks like their showing off worked on you!
Label.fr: On dirait que leur façon de frimer fait son effet sur toi en tout cas !
Label.es: Looks like their showing off worked on you!
Label.zh: Looks like their showing off worked on you!
